title: Man Medium Skin Tone Beard
description: A man with a medium skin tone and a beard. This emoji represents a bearded individual with a specific skin tone, often used for manal representation or in discussions about men.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man with a beard, rendered in a medium skin tone, presents a friendly and approachable demeanor, highlighted by Apple's soft rounded edges and naturalistic shading. His beard is subtly textured, adding depth and realism, while his facial expression is calm and neutral, suggesting reliability and maturity. This emoji on Apple devices is a versatile representation of a man, often used to signify a friend, a male family member, or simply to add a personal touch to conversations.
